mapper.select: SELECT r.start_date, r.start_time, r.end_date, r.end_time, s.title, l.location, h.name, u.nickname, r.rent_price FROM rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN location_tb AS l ON r.location_id = l.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN show_tb AS s ON r.show_id = s.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.rent_place_status = 1 ORDER BY r.start_date asc, r.end_date asc;
